name: TypeRacer - Minimalistic Colorful Progress Bars
description: Finally uploading a style for the new TypeRacer "Responsive" theme rework. I remixed morinted's original colorful bar code to be aligned with usernames and made it a bit thicker to match the font height. Similar to my previous style, Modern v3, I still keep my match text the same (green -> blue highlights, monospace font). The highlights were only implemented for Old-style 1 or 2. I worked on this for like 5 minutes so if something isn't working, feel free to DM me on TypeRacer (florentine). No guarantees I'll respond or update this style though, haha.
additional_info:
If you like the fonts I use, you can add this line to the beginning:
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto+Mono|Roboto:400,400i,700,700i');
